result.content:
Expand All | Collapse All
 Set Up: .FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.SetUp (edit)
Import
fitnesse.fixtures

SetUp
An alias link to a non-existent page on a virtual child should generate a [?] that links to an edit page on the remote server, not on the local server.

Page creator.
Page name. Page contents. Page attributes. valid?
VirtualPage !contents VirtualWiki=http://localhost:8080/FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.AcceptanceTestPage true

Response Requester.
uri valid?
VirtualPage.ChildWithAliasLinkToNonExistentSubPage true

Response Examiner
type pattern matches? wrapped html?
contents <a title="create page" href="http://localhost:8080/FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.AcceptanceTestPage\.ChildWithAliasLinkToNonExistentSubPage\.NonExistentSubPage\?edit&nonExistent=true" target=".*">\[\?\]</a> true   
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Length: 3691
Connection: close
Server: FitNesse-v20091014
Cache-Control: max-age=0
Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8

<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd">
<html>
	<head>
		<title>VirtualPage.ChildWithAliasLinkToNonExistentSubPage</title>
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/files/css/fitnesse.css" media="screen"/>
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/files/css/fitnesse_print.css" media="print"/>
		<script src="/files/javascript/fitnesse.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
	</head>
	<body class="virtual">
		<div class="sidebar">
			<div class="art_niche" onclick="document.location='FrontPage'"></div>
			<div class="actions">
				<!--Where Used button-->
				<a href="http://localhost:8080/FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.AcceptanceTestPage.ChildWithAliasLinkToNonExistentSubPage?whereUsed" target="newWindow" accesskey="w">Where Used</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Files button-->
				<a href="/files" target="newWindow" accesskey="f">Files</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Recent Changes button-->
				<a href="/RecentChanges" target="newWindow" accesskey="">Recent Changes</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--User Guide button-->
				<a href=".FitNesse.UserGuide" target="newWindow" accesskey="">User Guide</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Test History button-->
				<a href="?testHistory" target="newWindow" accesskey="">Test History</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="mainbar">
			<div class="header">
				<a href="/VirtualPage">VirtualPage</a>.
				<br/>
<span class="page_title">ChildWithAliasLinkToNonExistentSubPage</span>
<a style="font-size:small;" onclick="popup('addChildPopup')"> [add child]</a>			</div>
			<div class="main">This page contains an alias link to a non existent sub page.<br/>
<br/>
link<a title="create page" href="http://localhost:8080/FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.AcceptanceTestPage.ChildWithAliasLinkToNonExistentSubPage.NonExistentSubPage?edit&nonExistent=true" target="ChildWithAliasLinkToNonExistentSubPage.NonExistentSubPage">[?]</a><br/>
<div class="footer">
</div>
<div id="addChildPopup" class="popup_window">
  <div class="popup_title">Add Child Page to ChildWithAliasLinkToNonExistentSubPage</div>
  <div class="popup_content">
    <form action="VirtualPage.ChildWithAliasLinkToNonExistentSubPage" method="get">
      <input type="hidden" name="responder" value="addChild"/>
      <table border="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" height="100%">
        <tr>
          <td>
            <input type="radio" name="pageType" value="Normal"/> Normal<br/>

            <input type="radio" name="pageType" value="Test"/> Test<br/>

            <input type="radio" name="pageType" value="Suite"/> Suite<br/>

            <input type="radio" name="pageType" value="Default" checked="checked"/> Default<br/>

          </td>
          <td>
            <table border="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
              <tr>
                <td><label for="childName">Name</label></td?
                <td><input size="50" id="childName" type="text" name="name"/></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td><label for="childContent">Content</label></td>
                <td><input size="50" id="childContent" type="text" name="content" value="!contents"/></td>
              </tr>
            </table>
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td></td>
          <td>
            <input TYPE="button" VALUE="Cancel" onClick="popdown('addChildPopup')"/>
            <input value="Add" type="submit"/>
          </td>
        </tr>
      </table>
    </form>
  </div>
</div></div>
		</div>
	</body>
</html>

 Tear Down: .FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.TearDown (edit)

tear down
